text: Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez, (August 10, 1929 – October 15, 2019) was a Romanian actress. She was one of the most successful Romanian actresses of the 1960s–2000s who worked at Odeon Theatre. She was known for Liceenii (1986), (1992), Silent Wedding (2008) and Everybody in Our Family (2012).Tamara Buciuceanu . port.ro Buciuceanu was born in Tighina, Moldova, Romania. Buciuceanu died of cardiovascular disease at a Bucharest hospital on October 15, 2019 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian television actors Category:Romanian stage actors Category:Deaths from cardiovascular disease Category:Actors from Bucharest
title: Tamara Buciuceanu
